answers.answer: Hello and welcome!Hashimoto’s disease is a thyroid gland disorder caused due to reaction of the immune system against the thyroid gland. This condition can be rarely associated with other polyglandular syndromes caused by the immune system like adrenal insufficiency, type 1 diabetes, hypoparathyroidism, pernicious anemia, Sjogren’s syndrome, fungal infections of the mouth and nails etc. Being aware of risk factors may allow earlier diagnosis and treatment. Do write to us again with more queries.Take care and regards!
